data.name: ATM Machine
data.description:
ATM Machine Class/Constructor

# Task

Create a class or a constructor named `ATMMachine` that accepts an object as a parameter, i.e., the stored account information.

# Parameter

```
{
username: {
money: int,
password: any
}
...
}
```
# Return
```javascript
ATMMachine [object]
accountInfo: {/* Parameter */}
confirm: ƒ (password)
loggedInUser: null // can change
login: ƒ (username, password)
logout: ƒ ()
needConfirm: false // can change
pay: ƒ (touser, money)
unreg: ƒ (password)
```

# Functions

## ATMMachine.login

Login to a registered account.

### Inputs

*   `username`: the username of the account to log in
*   `password`: the password of the account to log in

### Outputs

*   `Please log out before logging in to another account`: if the user is already logged in and trying to log in to another account without logging out first
*   `Account not found`: if there is no account associated with the provided username
*   `Incorrect password`: if the password provided is incorrect
*   `Login OK`: if the login was successful


## ATMMachine.logout

Log out of the currently logged-in account.

### Inputs

No inputs required

### Outputs

*   `You are not logined`: if there is no account currently logged in
*   `Logout OK`: if the logout was successful

## ATMMachine.unreg

Unregister the currently logged-in account.

### Inputs

*   `password`: the password of the account to unregister

### Outputs

*   `Please login`: if there is no account currently logged in
*   `Incorrect password`: if the password provided is incorrect
*   `Please confirm`: if the correct password was provided and confirmation is required before unregistering

## ATMMachine.confirm

Confirm unregistering the currently logged-in account.

### Inputs

*   `password`: the password of the account to unregister

### Outputs

*   `Please login`: if user is not logged in, return it
*   `Do not need confirm`: if confirmation is not required before unregistering
*   `Incorrect password`: if the password provided is incorrect
*   `Unregistered`: if the correct password was provided and the account has been successfully unregistered

### Notes
*   Use a flag to determine if confirmation is required

## ATMMachine.pay

Transfer funds from the currently logged-in account to another registered account.

### Inputs

*   `touser`: the username of the account to transfer funds to
*   `money`: the amount of money to transfer (a positive integer)

### Outputs

*   `Please login`: if user is not logged in, return it
*   `Account not found`: if there is no account associated with the provided username
*   `Balance insufficient`: if the balance of the currently logged-in account is less than the requested transfer amount
*   `Pay OK`: if the transfer was successful

# Go!

<big>Good luck!</big>
